    • 方法详细资料

      • setScatterDirection

        public void setScatterDirection(boolean isDebug)
        Set Chaser's next moving direction when in SCATTER mode.

        The target location is top left corner.

        参数:
        isDebug - Indicates if the app is in DEBUG mode

      • setChaseDirection

        public void setChaseDirection(boolean isDebug)
        Set Chaser's next moving direction when in CHASE mode.

        The target location is waka's postion.

        参数:
        isDebug - (boolean) Indicates if the app is in DEBUG mode

      • handleMovement

        public static void handleMovement(Game game)
        Handle the logic of Chaser's movement. It behaves differently in different modes. It can only move if there is no wall in its direction of moving
        参数:
        game - Game object
